00013 class ListBoxTest : public CPPUNIT_NS::TestFixture

00051   void testListBoxCaption(){ 
00052     const char* t="TestCaption";
00053     this->m_caption->setText(t);
00054     const char* ret=this->m_caption->getText();
00055     int cmp=strcmp(t, ret);
00056     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( cmp==0 );
00057   }
00058 
00065   void testListBoxX(){ 
00066     int x=1;
00067     this->m_caption->setX(x);
00068     int ret=this->m_caption->getX();
00069     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( x==ret );
00070   }

00079     int y=2;

00081     int ret=this->m_caption->getY();
00082     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( y==ret );

00120 
00121   }
00122 
00129   void testListBoxHasntFocus(){
00130     this->m_caption->setFocus(false);
00131     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( !this->m_caption->getFocus() );
00132   }
00133 
00139   void testListBoxCanTakeFocus(){
00140     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( this->m_caption->canHaveFocus());
00141   }
00142 
00149   void testListBoxPosition(){
00150     int x=25;
00151     int y=76;
00152     this->m_caption->setPosition(x, y);
00153     int x2= this->m_caption->getX();
00154     int y2= this->m_caption->getY();
00155     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(x==x2 && y==y2);
00156   }
00157 
00161   void testListBoxAddItem(){
00162     this->m_caption->addItem("testItem");
00163     unsigned itemCount=this->m_caption->itemCount();
00164     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(itemCount==1);
00165   }
00166 
00170   void testListBoxDrawCaption(){
00171     this->m_caption->setDrawCaption(false);
00172     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(!this->m_caption->getDrawCaption());
00173   }
